profile:
Toronto's premier company for all barbeque, gas fireplace and needs. We specialize in cleaning and repair and pride ourselves on quality and customer service.  
At Barbeque Pro Inc. there’s always someone on the other end of the phone line during business hours. Our sales department, parts department and service department are tasked with ensuring a prompt, courteous and efficient response to your inquiries.

profile:
TORONTO - AJAX - WHITBY - SCARBOROUGH   //   Classic Fireplace & BBQ Store is YOUR FIREPLACE PROFESSIONAL.

Accessories including tool sets, screens & wood holders.  
BBQs, Smokers, charcoal grills and accessories!
We are open for business and we are following all Covid-19 regulations.
